D

dft(double[], boolean) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.spectrum.Spectrum
returns the absolute values of the amplitude spectrum of x,
if onlyPositive is set to true, the only the non-mirrored output is returned
dft(Complex[]) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.spectrum.Spectrum
compute the DFT of x[] via brute force (n^2 time)
diff(long[]) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
computes the difference from one element to the next, numeric differentiation
diff(double[]) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
computes the difference from one element to the next, numeric differentiation
diff(double[], double[]) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
computes the time based difference of ar based on time values in t
distance(double[], double[]) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec2Scalar
computes the distance between two points in 1D and greater
distanceMatrix(double[][]) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Mat
computes the distance matrix for each point in points to all other points
here points[][] is a 2D double array, where the first dimension is the number of rows and the 2nd dimension the number of features/coordinates of the points Example 1:
if the distance between two Points P1 {1, 0} and P2 {1, 1} in 2D should be computed, points should look the following way:
point[0][0] = 1;
point[0][1] = 0;
point[1][0] = 1;
point[1][1] = 1; Example 2:
distance between two Points P1 {1, 1, 2} and P2 {0, 2, 3} in 3D
point[0][0] = 1;
point[0][1] = 1;
point[0][2] = 2;
point[1][0] = 0;
point[1][1] = 2;
point[1][2] = 3; The result returned is a symmetric matrix D_ij, that reads in the following way:
D_ij is the distance between Point i and Point j
all values D_ii are 0 (reads: distance from Point i to Point i --> 0)
downsample(double[], int, Vec.DownsamplingAlgorithm) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
downsamples an array using the specified algorithm
Link
downsampleBruteForce(double[], int) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
downsamples an array ar by returning only every n-th value in new array, where n = ar.length / m
this is a brute force approach, very fast but quality depends on data, works better with smooth data
downsampleLargestTriangleOneBucket(double[], int) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
downsampling ar to an array of size m using the Largest-Triangle-One-Bucket Algorithm
Link
downsampleMax(double[], int) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
downsampling ar to an array of size m, where the maximum value in a window is used as representative value
downsampleMean(double[], int) - Static method in class net.sytes.botg.array.math.Vec
downsampling ar to an array of size m, where the mean value in a window is used as representative value
